Item.comments: called from any life cycle transitions that goes to --> Closed
Item.method_code:
'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() Dim actionItem As Item = Me.newItem(Me.GetType(),"get") actionItem.setID(Me.GetID()) actionItem.setAttribute("select","is_closing_notes_required,action_item_closing_notes") actionItem = actionItem.apply()
If actionItem.getProperty("is_closing_notes_required","0") = "1" Then If actionItem.getProperty("action_item_closing_notes","") = "" Then return actionItem.getInnovator().newError("Missing closing notes on this Action Item. Please add notes and try again.") End If end if
return Me
Item.name: gAction Item Check Closing Notes
